Uses of Package
edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram

  • Packages that use edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram 
    Package Description
    edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.classes  
    edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.grammar
    Provides classes and interfaces that can be used to represent a graph of words and word transitions.
    edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram
    Provides classes and interfaces that represent a stochastic language model
    edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram.large
    Provides an implementation of the LanguageModel interface.
    edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.lextree
    Provides an implementation of the Linguist that represents the search space as a lex tree.
    edu.cmu.sphinx.result
    Provides a set of classes that represent the result of a recognition.
  • Classes in edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram used by edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.classes 
    Class and Description
    LanguageModel
    Represents the generic interface to an N-Gram language model.
  • Classes in edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram used by edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.grammar 
    Class and Description

  • Classes in edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram used by edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram 
    Class and Description
    BackoffLanguageModel
    Represents the generic interface to an N-Gram language model that uses backoff to estimate unseen probabilities.
    LanguageModel
    Represents the generic interface to an N-Gram language model.
    ProbDepth
    Class for returning results from BackoffLanguageModel
  • Classes in edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram used by edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram.large
